thread.title: Video shows moments before a fatal self-driving crash

title: Video shows moments before a fatal self-driving crash
text:
Video shows moments before a fatal self-driving crash Wednesday, March 21, 2018 - 01:36 
Police in Arizona on Wednesday released a short video of a fatal collision between an Uber self-driving vehicle and a pedestrian, as investigators probe the accident that has put new focus on the safety of autonomous vehicles.   
Police in Arizona on Wednesday released a short video of a fatal collision between an Uber self-driving vehicle and a pedestrian, as investigators probe the accident that has put new focus on the safety of autonomous vehicles.  //reut.rs/2IFYuPj
